ing: 1 (20 ounce) package Green GiantÂ® Cheddar & Bacon Mashed Cauliflower
1/4 cup non-fat Greek yogurt or sour cream
des: "Looking for an indulgent side dish but without the guilt? Start with our Cheddar & Bacon Mashed Cauliflower and stir in some Greek yogurt and green onions. That's it! Tastes great, it's good for you and best of all, it's ready in just 12 minutes!"
ins:
Heat Green GiantÂ® Cheddar & Bacon Mashed Cauliflower according to package directions.
Stir sour cream into Green GiantÂ® Cheddar & Bacon Mashed Cauliflower.
Sprinkle with green onions.
